passives.short_desc: Speed Buff: Raises SPD

passives.desc: Slightly recovers more HP with heals

passives.short_desc: Charged Regroup: Raises use count of Regroup

passives.short_desc: Cooking for Comrades: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Buffed Initial Attack
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 ATK with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buffed Initial Attack: Raises INT BRV、 ATK

passives.name: Regroup Extension
passives.desc:
When using Regroup:
 • Slight boost to HP restored based on individual MAX HP
 • Slight boost to HP restored based on INT BRV
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on party's current total HP
 • First Aid duration +5
passives.short_desc: Regroup Extension: Boost to Regroup

passives.name: Buff Boost Speed
passives.desc: Moderately raises MAX BRV、 SPD with active buff
passives.short_desc: Buff Boost Speed: Raises MAX BRV、 SPD

passives.name: Quick Recipeh Extension
passives.desc:
When using Quick Recipeh:
 • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
 • Ambrosia duration +4

While Memory Lane Pastry active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (Pastry) (removes BRV attack; grants party BRV based on own INT BRV)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (Pastry) (increases BRV based on INT BRV before HP attack; grants allies BRV based on HP damage dealt)

While Papa Bird & Baby Bowl active:
 • BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (P&B Bowl) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack; BRV attack hit count becomes 2; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage; higher turn rate)
 • HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (P&B Bowl) (grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before attack; melee BRV attack + HP attack; higher turn rate)
passives.short_desc: Quick Recipeh Extension: Boost to Quick Recipeh

passives.name: Shatter Brilliance
passives.desc: Slightly raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Shatter Brilliance: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: Boost All Extension
passives.desc: When using Boost All:\n • Slight raised party MAX BRV boost
passives.short_desc: Boost All Extension: Boost to Boost All

passive.name: Boost All Growth
passive.desc: Boost All use +1\n\nBoost All effect duration +2
passive.short_desc: Boost All Growth: Boost to Boost All

passive.name: Future Tactician
passive.desc:
When using Regroup:
 • Increased party HP recovery
 • Boost to BRV granted to party based on current HP total
 • First Aid boost、 duration+
 • Turn rate becomes instantaneous
 • Does not add to turn count; does consume turn during summoning、 support

passive.name: Retainer's Lineage
passive.desc: When using Quick Recipeh:\n • Boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV\n • Ambrosia boost
passive.short_desc: Retainer's Lineage: Boost to Quick Recipeh

passives.name: Quick Overwhelm
passives.desc: Slightly raises turn rate for Overwhelm
passives.short_desc: Quick Overwhelm: Raises turn rate of Overwhelm

passives.name: Overwhelm BRV Rejuvenate
passives.desc: When using Overwhelm:\n • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Overwhelm BRV Rejuvenate: Boost to BRV granted based on MAX BRV when using Overwhelm

passives.name: Overwhelm Recast Up
passives.desc: Slightly raises recast speed of Overwhelm
passives.short_desc: Overwhelm Recast Up: Raises recast speed of Overwhelm

passive.name: Philosopher's Contemplation Extension
passive.short_desc: Philosopher's Contemplation Extension: Boost to Overwhelm

passives.name: Overwhelm Advance Attack Up++
passives.desc:
When using Overwhelm:
 • Increased BRV may exceed individual MAX BRV up to 120%

While equipping EX+ weapon Plunderers (XV)+ or passive ability Philosopher's Contemplation Extension:
 • Moderately raises ATK

BRV Attack+ (Pastry) becomes BRV Attack++ (Pastry) (slight boost to BRV granted based on own INT BRV)

HP Attack+ (Pastry) becomes HP Attack++ (Pastry) (increased BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%; slight boost to BRV granted based on HP damage dealt)

BRV Attack+ (P&B Bowl) becomes BRV Attack++ (P&B Bowl) (moderate BRV damage boost)

HP Attack+ (P&B Bowl) becomes HP Attack++ (P&B Bowl) (BRV attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%)
passives.short_desc: Overwhelm Advance Attack Up++: Boost to Overwhelm; raises ATK

passives.name: Philosopher's Contemplation Extension Initial Boost
passives.desc: While equipping EX+ weapon Plunderers (XV)+ or passive ability Philosopher's Contemplation Extension:\n • Moderately raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Philosopher's Contemplation Extension Initial Boost: Raises INT BRV、 MAX BRV

passives.name: First Aid & Ambrosia Buff Starting
passives.desc:
At start of quest:
 • Self: 10 turns First Aid; 7 turns Ambrosia
 • BRV Attack becomes Dishes (Memory Lane Pastry)
 • HP Attack becomes Dishes (Papa Bird & Baby Bowl)
passives.short_desc: First Aid & Ambrosia Buff Starting: First Aid、 Ambrosia at start of quest

passives.name: Overwhelm BRV Rejuvenate Advance
passives.desc: When using Overwhelm:\n • Slight boost to BRV granted based on own MAX BRV\n • Slightly raises limit that BRV may exceed MAX BRV
passives.short_desc: Overwhelm BRV Rejuvenate Advance: Boost to Overwhelm
